dataSet.name: IncomeStatement

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN (Project = VALUE(Catalog.Projects.EmptyRef )) OR (Project IS NULL) THEN "Not specified" ELSE Project.Description END

dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED SystemTitle.Value AS OurCompany, AccountTypes.Ref AS AccountType, CASE WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income) THEN "Income" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales) THEN "COGS" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense) THEN "Expenses" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome) THEN "Other Income" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense) THEN "Other Expenses" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense) THEN "Income Tax Expense" ELSE "" END AS AccountTypePresentation, ProjectDataTurnovers.Account AS Account, ProjectDataTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, CASE WHEN NOT ProjectDataTurnovers.Account IS NULL THEN ProjectDataTurnovers.AmountTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCTurnover, ProjectDataTurnovers.Project {SELECT AccountType.*, Account.*, Recorder, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM AccumulationRegister.ProjectData.Turnovers( , , Auto, Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense)) ) AS ProjectDataTurnovers FULL JOIN Enum.AccountTypes AS AccountTypes ON (AccountTypes.Ref = ProjectDataTurnovers.Account.AccountType) LEFT JOIN Constant.SystemTitle AS SystemTitle ON (TRUE) WHERE AccountTypes.Ref IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense)) {WHERE AccountTypes.Ref AS AccountType, ProjectDataTurnovers.Account AS Account, ProjectDataTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, ProjectDataTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, ProjectDataTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod}

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END
